You are connected! Please wait until the: You are connected! Please wait until the game starts.
The game has started and it seems you ar: The game has started and it seems you are not part of it. Maybe you can join the next one?

Please follow the instructions of the qu: Please follow the instructions of the quizmaster.
This screen should only be used by the Q: This screen should only be used by the Quiz Master.
Make sure that the master code was not v: Make sure that the master code was not visible to any players.

A few things to keep in mind:: A few things to keep in mind:
Hand out the player codes to all players: Hand out the player codes to all players
Make sure that the Quizmaster has a copy: Make sure that the Quizmaster has a copy of the master code: %s
This is it. When you click this button,: This is it. When you click this button, there is no turning back.
First, the quiz introduction will play,: First, the quiz introduction will play, after that you should walk on the stage and start talking.
Okay we lied. There is one more confirma: Okay we lied. There is one more confirmation dialog.
Are you sure you want to start the game?: Are you sure you want to start the game?
Are you sure you are ready to continue?: Are you sure you are ready to continue?
These are the connect codes. Write down: These are the connect codes. Write down the master code (for the quiz masters) and the player codes (to hand out to the players) and make sure you keep them save.
Please read the names of the first %s pl: Please read the names of the first %s players.
All other players will see their score a: All other players will see their score afterwards on their own device.
Please award points to the winner of the: Please award points to the winner of the duel.
Please confirm the daredevil duel result: Please confirm the daredevil duel results.
Select the amount of players that will b: Select the amount of players that will be competing in this duel.
Next up: revealing correct answer for qu: Next up: revealing correct answer for question.
While we are waiting for the game to sta: While we are waiting for the game to start, here are a few tips on how to prepare yourself for what is coming.
The game is fairly simple: questions wil: The game is fairly simple: questions will appear on the big screen and you will have to answer them here on your smart device.
The amount of points you can earn depend: The amount of points you can earn depends on the question.
For most questions, the golden rule is:: For most questions, the golden rule is: the faster you answer, the more points you earn.
The presenter will state when this is no: The presenter will state when this is not the case.
The game consists of various questions a: The game consists of various questions and round types.
We will take a look at some of these rig: We will take a look at some of these right now!
The first question type we will look at: The first question type we will look at is 'multiple choice'. It can't get much simpler than that: just chose your answer by clicking one of the options.
You can't change your answer, so chose c: You can't change your answer, so chose carefully!
Great! That was easy, wasn't it?: Great! That was easy, wasn't it?
Next up: 'open questions'. These are sli: Next up: 'open questions'. These are slightly harder since you will have to type in the answer.
Depending on your device you will have t: Depending on your device you will have to click the input field to activate the keyboard.
Don't forget to click the submit button: Don't forget to click the submit button to actually confirm in your answer.
While in multiple choice questions you l: While in multiple choice questions you lose points for every millisecond you wait to answer, open questions are handled slightly differently.
To lower the impact of your typing skill: To lower the impact of your typing skills, points are calculated in five blocks: answering within the first ⅕ of the time will give you all points, answering within the second ⅕ of the time gives you ⅘ of the points, ...
Now these are super fun! In 'order quest: Now these are super fun! In 'order questions' you will need to rank 4 items in the correct order.
You will need to click each item. You wi: You will need to click each item. You will need to select them in the order you think is correct. If you clicked all the items, your answer will be submitted automatically.
You will see the numbers in which order: You will see the numbers in which order they were selected, appear on the items.
Note that, as long as you haven't clicke: Note that, as long as you haven't clicked the 4th option, you can change your answer. Simply click the options in reverse order to undo your selection.
Just like with multiple choice questions: Just like with multiple choice questions, the faster you answer the more points you get.
I'm glad we've sorted that out!: I'm glad we've sorted that out!
Last but not least: image map questions.
We'll show you an image, you just need t: We'll show you an image, you just need to click on it.
Points are calculated based on how fast: Points are calculated based on how fast you've answered and how close you are to the target.
Note that you can't zoom in, so make sur: Note that you can't zoom in, so make sure your first click counts.
Can't see the image? Ask the technical s: Can't see the image? Ask the technical staff for support.
Great! That should make things crystal c: Great! That should make things crystal clear.
Set your devices screen saver / sleep mo: Set your devices screen saver / sleep mode as high as possible, or disable it completely for the duration of the game. This way you won't lose precious seconds turning your device back on.
Lock your screen orientation to make sur: Lock your screen orientation to make sure you don't lose time when passing the tablet along.
Should you lose connection or accidental: Should you lose connection or accidentally refresh this page, don't worry! Enter your code again and you will be reconnected. We will keep your points safe.
Now that you are fully prepared you can: Now that you are fully prepared you can relax and wait for the game to start.
P.S.: while waiting for the game to star: P.S.: while waiting for the game to start: why don't you look what happens when you drag your smiley to the bottom of the screen.
(Don't worry, we'll make sure you won't: (Don't worry, we'll make sure you won't miss the start of the game.)
